price: Sema: Ataihuisha huyo huyo aliye iumba hapo mara ya mwanzo. Na Yeye ni Mjuzi wa kila kuumba.
arabic: قُلۡ يُحۡيِيهَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٖۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلۡقٍ عَلِيمٌ
footnotes: Ewe Muhammad! Sema: Atayafufua yule yule aliye yaumba hapo mara ya kwanza. Kwani aliye anza anao uweza wa kufanya tena. Naye ni Mkubwa wa kujua kila alicho kiumba. Basi haemewi Yeye na kukusanya vipande vipande baada ya kutawanyika.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul yuḥ'yīhā alladhī ansha-ahā awwala marratin wahuwa bikulli khalqin ʿalīmun
